name: Chaotic Loop
description:
Reach that gold medal in this colorful platform game!
So yea just have fun completing the level and then do it again! while also trying to reach the gold!

2 playable characters
-Jenna: she can kick the enemies in the**
-Droy: he can make a fireball fall from the sky

There are 5 different maps
Some maps have unique platforms, the maps are
-Desert
-Iceland
-Bosco
-City
-Beach

come, and do your best score in chaotic loop!
